message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a serious offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1000000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1000000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'm looking for.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $800000 is a significant discount, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering the value this product can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $850000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $925000. This is a great compromise, considering the value this product can bring to your business.

I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $875000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $950000. This is a great compromise, considering the value this product can bring to your business.
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Alice. I'm willing to make one more offer, but I'm not going to go any higher than $900000. This is my final offer. Can you consider it?

I understand that you're feeling frustrated, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up on this deal just yet. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $975000. This is a great compromise, considering the value this product can bring to your business.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $900000, Alice. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'm looking for. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to walk away from the deal. I'm not willing to pay more than that.
